params.defense: Hellbent *(You can't die at night. Whenever you're visited at night, you take 1 damage. Once you take 5 damage, you die.)*

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Play a Mace?! on a player each night, dealing an Unstoppable attack to them and a Basic attack to each of their closest living neighbours. You may only use this ability once.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Whenever a player uses a limited-use ability, they gain a use of that ability.
- Players may copy abilities as though Rule 16 didn't apply.
- Attacking abilities resolve immediately.
- As normal night abilities resolve, the host will randomly forget to process one ability. It will instead resolve ten minutes after the next day begins.
- The host may not create any emergency rules and must interpret all rules and role cards as literally as possible.
- This role may only roll in rolelists that are more than 80% Any slots.
- Bionic can't kill Psycho.
- If this role has an alias in the bot that's a player's name, any attack it deals to that player is Overkill.
